tool_description:
This API allows converting numbers to written form in any language.
For example, 1234 is converted to:
* “one thousand two hundred thirty-four” in English
* "mille deux cent trente-quatre" in French
* "mil doscientos treinta y cuatro" in Spanish
name: Spellout
title: Spellout

api_list.name: Languages
RuleSets
api_list.description: List of availible rule sets for given language

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: 2 letter ICO 639 language code. Specifies language for which all availible rule sets will be provided. Use /v1/languages endpoint to list all supported languages.

api_list.name: SpellOut
api_list.description: Spell out number in given language using provided rule set

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: 2 letter ICO 639 language code. Specifies language in which number will be spelled out. Use /v1/languages endpoint to list all supported languages.

required_parameters.name: ruleset
required_parameters.description: Rule Set name. Specifiles rule set accoring to which number will be spelled out. Use /v1/rulesets to list all supported rule sets for any given language.
